package.name: laser_free_to_cloud
package.description: This package contains a class for extracting the free parts from a 2D laser scan as defined by sensor_msgs/LaserScan into a point cloud as defined by sensor_msgs/PointCloud or sensor_msgs/PointCloud2. In particular, it contains functionality to account for the skew resulting from moving robots or tilting laser scanners. Based on laser_geometry by Tully Foote and Radu Bogdan Rusu.
package.author: Margarida Faria
